Introduction

Ahn Daniel, popularly known as Niel, is a South Korean singer under New Entry. He is best known for being the main vocalist and face of the boy group Teen Top under Top Media Entertainment. Aside from performing, Niel also writes and composes tracks. He made his solo debut on February 16, 2015.
